name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software design and architecture, proficient in **Python**, **TDD**, **BDD**, and **CI/CD** practices. Skilled in deploying cloud infrastructure using **AWS**, **Terraform**, and **CloudFormation**, and experienced with **containerization technologies** such as **K8s**. Expertise in utilizing message brokers including **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for building scalable systems, and skilled in databases like **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**.

Fluent in developing high-performance applications across industries, including healthcare and finance, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience with AI/ML applications and MLOps frameworks, including **MLflow** and **Databricks**, enhancing solutions with predictive analytics and real-time processing capabilities. Strong advocate of compliance-driven development, aligning systems with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven leadership in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures.
